title: France panorama. [No. 69/50]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. France and the future of the common market - European problems at the Hague Summit Conference. 2. A mushrooming university - the new Saint Maur University. 3. Ellington renders homage - Duke Ellington in Paris. 4. The treasures of the Bordeaux Museum - an exhibition of 18th century paintings in Paris. 5. Andre Gide would be a hundred - the celebrated author was born just 100 years ago.
